details.des: Here are the dinner packages for your friends and family in Dhaka. This ingrediens we collect from kings and agora super mall. This food  package  delivery in Dhaka is available for dinner(8pm-10:30pm) time. If you need this  package for more than the mention person people, please select the quantity before adding this product to your shopping basket if you select 2 then all item are going double. Order one day before your required delivery time.

details.pack3: 5 plates of Biriyani,10 piece of Shrimp,Special vegtable curry,one full size chicken fry. Package price is 1000 BDT
